:::Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx/Airazor:::

::They stop running when they realize that the Alliance are heading for the 
CF.  Torca looks to Klant::
Torca:  Well, partner, looks like were gonna stay here and wait for the 
Allance to attack.  We might as well prepare ourselves.
::Torca pulls out his dorsal gun and swords, Sideswipe takes out his missle 
launcher and rifle, Ratchet takes out his blasters, Sky Lynx deploys his 
missle launchers, and Airazor opens up her missle pods in her wrists.  In 
other words, any Alliance member within 10 feet of them will be doused with 
heavy ammo::

--part1_98.dc5dda1.27681168_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>:::Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx/Airazor:::

<BR>Torca:  Well, partner, looks like were gonna stay here and wait for the <BR>Allance to attack.  We might as well prepare ourselves.
<BR>::Torca pulls out his dorsal gun and swords, Sideswipe takes out his missle <BR>launcher and rifle, Ratchet takes out his blasters, Sky Lynx deploys his <BR>missle launchers, and Airazor opens up her missle pods in her wrists.  In <BR>other words, any Alliance member within 10 feet of them will be doused with <BR>heavy ammo::</FONT></HTML>
